name: Artem Stories: Util Genocide
description:
A third person multiplayer rpg game about the genocide in Util by Artem in 2085 in Artem Stories. The massacre of Artem soldiers in Util is very clearly explained in the game. There are also hiding and escaping items in the game, but our game is only a demo, if you want to see the full version of the game, you can help by donating, Thank you.
